camera_gear.model: Sony A7R V / Fujifilm GFX 100S / Canon EOS R5
camera_gear.lens: Tilt-Shift Wide-Angle TS-E 24mm f/3.5L II / PC Nikkor 24mm f/3.5D ED / GF 30mm f/3.5 TS
camera_gear.sensor: Full-frame 61MP BSI CMOS / Medium Format 102MP sensor
camera_gear.aperture: f/8.0 - f/11 (deep depth of field for environmental context)

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Late morning to early afternoon (10:00 AM - 2:00 PM)
lighting_setup.weather: Overcast with heavy cloud cover, diffused natural light
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Soft top-down diffused skylight from zenith, minimal directional shadow
lighting_setup.quality: Ultra-soft, diffused, even lighting, shadowless illumination with gray sky acting as giant softbox

color_grading.palette: Naturalistic urban palette, fresh green foliage, neutral gray asphalt and white road markings, desaturated blue-gray sky
color_grading.saturation: Medium saturation (80-85%), natural color rendering with slight desaturation on greens for realism, authentic urban color balance
color_grading.contrast: Low to medium contrast, lifted shadows for detail in building interiors and under canopies, compressed highlights for cloud detail retention

texture_quality.details: High-resolution capture of roofing texture, vehicle motion blur, pedestrian activity, asphalt aggregate texture, tree foliage definition
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Clear glass reflections, textured asphalt road surface, concrete traffic barriers, lush green tree canopies

composition_guide.type: Environmental street photography perspective, two-point perspective converging toward building center, eye-level camera height
composition_guide.balance: Asymmetrical dynamic balance, vertical rhythm of street lights framing the composition

atmosphere.mood: Authentic urban documentary, everyday metropolitan rhythm, integration of architecture with civic infrastructure, dynamic coexistence of static building and moving traffic
atmosphere.feeling: Vibrant city life, accessible public architecture, momentary capture of urban flow, realistic portrayal of architectural context within bustling streetscape

technical_quality.post_processing: Perspective correction for vertical lines, clarity and structure enhancement on architectural forms, motion blur preservation on vehicles for dynamism, chromatic aberration removal, shadow lifting (+25) for under-canopy detail
technical_quality.white_balance: Cloudy preset (6000-6500K) with neutral tint, preserving cool overcast sky while maintaining warm building material accuracy
technical_quality.tone: Mid-key tonal range with bright but soft overall exposure, neutral contrast curve with slight S-curve for pop, crushed blacks avoided to preserve asphalt texture detail
technical_quality.vignette: No vignette or extremely subtle (-5%) to maintain documentary realism and even illumination
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High dynamic range processing (14+ stops) simultaneously preserving detail in bright overcast sky clouds and shadowed building undercroft/entrance areas
